00030 void cimunit_event_init_with_thread(cimunit_event_t *event, const char *name,
00031                                     const char *thread) {
00032     char *event_name = malloc(strlen(name) + 1);
00033     strcpy(event_name, name);
00034     event->event_name = event_name;
00035     
00036     if (thread != NULL) {
00037         char *thread_name = malloc(strlen(thread) + 1);
00038         strcpy(thread_name, thread);
00039         event->thread_name = thread_name;
00040     } else {
00041         event->thread_name = NULL;
00042     }
00043     
00044     event->action_events = cimunit_event_list_init();
00045     cimunit_barrier_init(&(event->condition_barrier));
00046 
00047     event->is_action = FALSE;
00048 }
00049 
00050 
00051 void cimunit_event_init(cimunit_event_t *event, const char *name)
00052 {
00053     cimunit_event_init_with_thread(event, name, NULL);
00054 }
00055 
00056 
00057 void cimunit_event_destroy(cimunit_event_t *event) {
00058     cimunit_event_list_destroy(&event->action_events); 
00059     cimunit_barrier_destroy(&(event->condition_barrier));
00060 }
00061 
00062 
00063 void cimunit_event_add_action(cimunit_event_t *condition,
00064                               cimunit_event_t *action)
00065 {
00066     // Add event to head of the action event list
00067     cimunit_event_list_add(&condition->action_events, action);
00068     
00069     // action event now needs to be marked as such
00070     action->is_action = TRUE;
00071 }
00072 
00073 
00074 const struct cimunit_event_list *cimunit_event_get_action_list(
00075   cimunit_event_t *event) {
00076     return event->action_events;
00077 }
